import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormControl, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-new-page', templateUrl: './new-page.component.html', styles: [ ] }) export class NewPageComponent { public heroFrom = new FormGroup({ id: new FormControl(''), superhero: new FormControl(''), publisher: new FormControl(''), alter_ego: new FormControl(''), first_appearance: new FormControl(''), characters: new FormControl(''), alt_img: new FormControl(''), }); public publishers = [ { id: 'DC Comics', desc: 'DC-Comics'}, { id: 'Marvel Comics', desc: 'Marvel - Comics'} ]; }
